Package com.perisic.beds

Class DepositItemReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.perisic.beds.DepositItemReceiver

  • public class DepositItemReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Marc Conrad A class to carry out the overall system totalweight and totalsize are two static variables to measure the weight and the size of the items The variable theReceiptBasis of ReceiptBasis class is initiated to null A variable called printerInt of PrinterInterface class has been set to null at the beginning variable item of DepositItem class is also initiated to null to indicate that there wont be any items before adding

      void clearrecyclingmachine​()
      A method to call the machineclean method of the ReceiptBasis class theReceiptBasis variable of ReceiptBasis class is used to call the method implementation of machineclean method is in the ReceiptBasis
      void createReceiptBasis​()
      a method that creates the object to print the receipt
      java.lang.String printReceipt​()
      A method which will print the receipt Return type of this method has been changed to String from void to return a string this method will be called in CustomerPanel class using an object of this class

      • classifyItem

        public void classifyItem​(int slot)
        Parameters:
        slot - A method to maintain a slot for each items(Can, Crate,Plastic Bottle,Glass Bottle, Paper Bag) while adding each item, the total size and weight will be calculated individually If theReceiptBasis is null createReceiptBasis method will be called This method will be called in CustomerPanel using an object of this class
